Benchmark.title: Target Specification Examples
Benchmark.description: This benchmark demonstrates use of target-specification.

target.title: Target each user account on the system
target.description: This target will be run on each user account on the system. The enumeration element refers to a Value with each account. The instance element refers to a Value to be set to the specific account when evaluating one target instance, for passing to the check system.

Value.title: Target User Account Enumeration
Value.description: The revised source element allows retreiving a variable from OVAL, in this case, a list of all user accounts.

Value.title: Target User Account Instance
Value.description: This Value stub will be populated with a specific user account as each are separately evaluated in the Group using the associated target platform.

Group.title: Rules for each User Account
Group.description: The rules in this group are evaluated once for each user account on the system.

Rule.title: User Account must not have an empty password
